channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2020-4364|2024-09-17T01:21:47.676Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178961.

item.title: CVE-2019-4212|2024-09-17T03:38:01.852Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 159132.

item.title: CVE-2021-39041|2024-09-17T04:14:12.345Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 may be vulnerable to partial denial of service attack, resulting in some protocols not listening to specified ports. IBM X-Force ID: 214028.

item.title: CVE-2021-20337|2024-09-17T00:35:53.266Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 8 and 7.4.0 to 7.4.3 GA uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 194448.

item.title: CVE-2022-22320|2024-09-17T03:28:56.321Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 218367.

item.title: CVE-2020-4883|2024-09-17T04:04:17.900Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 could disclose sensitive information about other domains which could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190907.

item.title: CVE-2017-1695|2024-09-17T02:53:17.348Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 134177.

item.title: CVE-2020-4511|2024-09-17T01:05:53.154Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service of the qflow process by sending a malformed sflow command. IBM X-Force ID: 182366.

item.title: CVE-2020-4151|2024-09-17T02:37:10.870Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.0 through 7.3.3 could allow an authenticated attacker to perform unauthorized actions due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 174201.

item.title: CVE-2021-38878|2024-09-17T00:36:18.841Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a malicious actor to impersonate an actor due to key exchange without entity authentication. IBM X-Force ID: 208756.

item.title: CVE-2021-29755|2024-09-17T04:00:17.019Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 does not preform proper certificate validation for some inter-host communications. IBM X-Force ID: 202015.

item.title: CVE-2022-30613|2024-09-17T03:37:59.917Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5 could disclose sensitive information via a local service to a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 227366.

item.title: CVE-2021-20399|2024-09-17T03:34:04.313Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM Qradar SIEM 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 8 and 7.4.0 to 7.4.3 GA is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 196073.

item.title: CVE-2019-4508|2024-09-17T03:59:35.320Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.0 through 7.3.3 uses weak credential storage in some instances which could be decrypted by a local attacker. IBM X-Force ID: 164429.

item.title: CVE-2020-4979|2024-09-17T03:19:12.765Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to insecure inter-deployment communication. An attacker that is able to comprimise or spoof traffic between hosts may be able to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force D: 192538.

item.title: CVE-2021-29849|2024-09-17T00:25:54.131Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 205281.

item.title: CVE-2021-29880|2024-09-17T00:11:34.583Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.3 GA - 7.4.3 Fix Pack 1 when using domains or multi-tenancy could be vulnerable to information disclosure between tenants by routing SIEM data to the incorrect domain. IBM X-Force ID: 206979.

item.title: CVE-2020-4888|2024-09-17T03:32:59.470Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.0 to 7.4.2 Patch 1 and 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 7 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by insecure deserialization of user-supplied content by the Java deserialization function. By sending a malicious serialized Java object, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190912.

item.title: CVE-2018-1568|2024-09-17T04:15:12.988Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 143118.

item.title: CVE-2019-4054|2024-09-17T03:32:31.310Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information when exporting content that could aid an attacker in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 156563.

item.title: CVE-2018-2024|2024-09-17T03:17:53.371Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 155350.

item.title: CVE-2021-38869|2024-09-17T00:16:07.916Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some situations may not automatically log users out after they exceede their idle timeout. IBM X-Force ID: 208341.

item.title: CVE-2017-1622|2024-09-17T00:31:28.758Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2.8 and 7.3 does not validate, or incorrectly validates, a certificate. This weakness might allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by using a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. IBM X-force ID: 133120.

item.title: CVE-2018-2022|2024-09-17T01:51:30.644Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 155346.

item.title: CVE-2020-4513|2024-09-17T01:00:34.658Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182368.

item.title: CVE-2018-1728|2024-09-17T01:46:10.569Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 147707.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-08-02T22:23:44.080Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-07-12T21:17:31.087Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-06-26T15:37:11.292Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.
